message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product for a price that I think is very reasonable, considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was hoping to get closer to the value you place on the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1100000.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value you place on the product, I am still aiming to stay within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1080000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
